executable.title: (Utah) Deformable BSpline registration (alpha)
executable.description: Registers two images together using a normalized correlation metric and a multiresolution BSpline transform. This is an experimental module using a specialized BSpline method.
executable.contributor: Sam Gerber, Jim Miller, Steve Pieper, Ross Whitaker
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

integer.name: Detail
integer.description: Sets the detail of the warp. E.g. How much detail in the registration is matched. 0 = coarse registration, 10 = fine regystartion .
integer.label: Detail

image.name: FixedImageFileName
image.label: Fixed Image
image.description: Fixed image to which to register
